Welcome Back, Kadin! How can I help you today?
Hey, I want to create a new referral campaign, but I'd like some help from AI to make sure I'll set up correctly and performs well. Can you guide me through it?
K
I'd be happy to help you create a high-converting referral campaign that'll rock. Let's start by defining your main objective. What's the primary goal of this campaign?
My main goal is to increase sales through referrals. I want existing customers to bring in new paying customers, and I'd like to reward them for it.
K
That's a great goal! Referral campaigns work best when there's a strong incentive. What kind of rewards would you like to offer advocates who successfully refer new customers to your business?
Discount on next purchase
K
Smart choice! Discounts are a great way to encourage both referrals and repeat purchases. How much discount would you like to offer your successful referrers?
15%
K
15% sounds like a strong incentive! Now, let's define when a referral is considered valid. When should the referrer receive their reward?
When the referred person signs up
K
That's a great way to ensure that your campaign drives real revenue! Now, how long do you want this referral campaign to run?
I want to test this campaign for a while before making any long-term decisions, so I think 3 months would be ideal. If it works well, I can always extend it later.
K
